shortDescription: The SEOmatic component before 3.3.0 for Craft CMS allows Server-Side Template Injection that leads to RCE via malformed data to the metacontainers controller.
vulnerabilityName: craftcms craft_cms Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
